author: timbeiko
content: After talking with a few people, with ETHDenver next week, it seems best to skip our call and have the next one two weeks form now, on March 7. ACDC/E calls will still happen, in case there's something urgent to discuss in the meantime!

author: timbeiko
content: Agenda for the next call: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/732

author: bridge-bot
content:
<asn_d6> Hello from the c-kzg side. All bindings have been updated and merged upstream. You can now work with them.

There is still polishing work to be done though. Particularly, we expect the C# bindings (https://github.com/ethereum/c-kzg-4844/issues/150) and nodejs bindings (https://github.com/ethereum/c-kzg-4844/issues/153) to be improved over the next weeks (if you are a dev for those languages, help would be appreciated).
